overview: Christmas Dick In A Box - What do you give the girl who has everything? A big dick!  Fucking For Fourth Of July - These girls have a special way of showing their patriotism.  St. Patrick's Day Sex - No pinching. Just a whole lot of fucking.  Valentine's Day Surprise - Valentine's Day is for the one you love. It just shouldn't be your stepbrother.
title: The Bratty Sis Holiday Spectacular
